name: Responsible Rock Ownership
description:
Clean up your house, and protect it. From your pet rock.

ROCK likes to get up to mischief, but don't let it do anything too crazy, or you might have a mess that's just too big to clean up!

CONTROLS:

WSAD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

E / Left Mouse Button - Interact/Pick up Item

Right Mouse Button - Drop held Item

Only Windows version available (for now, at least).
